summary: Manages a collection of analysis runners, coordinates their execution, aggregates and enriches their output reports, applies filtering and threshold logic, and handles presentation and persistence of the consolidated results.
business_intent: Provide a unified interface for running multiple security/quality scanners on infrastructure-as-code assets, merging their findings into a single, guidelineâ€‘enhanced report that can be evaluated against failure thresholds and exported for CI/CD pipelines.
